mapper.select:
SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, ( SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男' ELSE '其它' END ) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'''') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, b.MZDM as mz, d.NAME as mzmc, b.HYZK as hyzkdm, ( SELECT CASE b.HYZK WHEN '0' THEN '未婚' WHEN '1' THEN '已婚' WHEN '2' THEN '离独' WHEN '3' THEN '丧偶' ELSE '未知 ' END ) AS hyzkmc, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.SSDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsf, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsq, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzx, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzxz, 'N' as dzc, 'N' as dzmphm, b.ZYDM as zylbdm, i.NAME as zylbmc, b.RYRQ as ryrq, CASE WHEN b.CYRQ IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE b.CYRQ END as cyrq, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN PUB_ZYDMK i on b.ZYDM=i.ID
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, ( SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男' ELSE '其它' END ) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, b.MZDM as mz, d.NAME as mzmc, b.HYZK as hyzkdm, ( SELECT CASE b.HYZK WHEN '0' THEN '未婚' WHEN '1' THEN '已婚' WHEN '2' THEN '离独' WHEN '3' THEN '丧偶' ELSE '未知 ' END ) AS hyzkmc, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.SSDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsf, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsq, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzx, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzxz, 'N' as dzc, 'N' as dzmphm, b.ZYDM as zylbdm, i.NAME as zylbmc, b.RYRQ as ryrq, CASE WHEN b.CYRQ IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE b.CYRQ END as cyrq, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN PUB_ZYDMK i on b.ZYDM=i.ID
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.CSRQ AS birth, CASE WHEN b.LXDH is null then 'N' WHEN b.LXDH = '' then 'N' else b.LXDH end as lxdh, ISNULL(b.HYZK,'-9') as hyzkdm, ( SELECT CASE b.HYZK WHEN '0' THEN '未婚' WHEN '1' THEN '已婚' WHEN '2' THEN '离独' WHEN '3' THEN '丧偶' ELSE '未知 ' END ) AS hyzk, b.MZDM as mzdm, d.NAME as mz, 'N' as hkszd, 'N' as csdz, 'N' as gzdw, 'N' as gzdwdz, 'N' as gzdwdh, 'N' as jgd, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, ( SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男' ELSE '其它' END ) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, t.CJSJ as jlrq, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, b.RYRQ as ryrq, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, b.RYRQ as ryrq, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, CONVERT(DATE,'1990-01-01 00:00:00',120) AS cfrq, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, CONVERT(DATE, ISNULL(b.CSRQ, '1990-01-01 00:00:00'), 120) AS csrq, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, e.GHXH as mjzh, b.ZYHM as zyh, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(e.GHLB)),'N') AS jzlb, t.QTBLJLXH as zqtysbh, CONVERT(DATE,'1990-01-01 00:00:00',120) AS tjsj, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, isnull(b.LXDH,'N') as lxdh, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK e on t.SYXH = e.EMRXH
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, e.GHXH as mjzh, b.ZYHM as zyh, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(e.GHLB)),'N') AS jzlb, t.QTBLJLXH as tysbh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK e on t.SYXH = e.EMRXH
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.HZXM as hzxm, e.GHXH as mjzh, b.ZYHM as zyh, b.SFZH as sfzhm, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, CONVERT(DATE, ISNULL(b.CSRQ, '1990-01-01 00:00:00'), 120) AS csrq, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, SUBSTRING(replace(b.CSRQ,'-',''),0,9) nly, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK e on t.SYXH = e.EMRXH
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}
